page.title: 0810yr OLD NICHOLAS' DAY
page.content: "On a Saturday morning I usually wake up to my brother saying, "Wake up". When I hear him I shut my eyes, snore and pretend to be asleep. He goes out. Peace! At about 8am I go down and watch the TV. When the programme's finished I go and get dressed and have my breakfast of sausages. After breakfast I feed my rabbit and go out to play. At about 1.30 I come in for lunch which is only a snack. Then after lunch I go back and play games like { {1,2,3 see you} and {It}or I go and ride my bike. At about 6pm I go in and have tea which is usually mince or curry. After tea I get ready for bed and watch a film. At about 9.30 I go to my bunk bed in my own room and read adventure stories until 9.45."
